txt.en: 'Working a smithy in this remote place isn't exactly the Great Forge in Thorin's Hall, but it's a step forward.'
'Dwarves here require tools, weapons, and armour, just as they do anywhere else.'
'The sound of the hammer and anvil ringing in the hills reminds me of home.'
'Don't stand too close to the forge! Wouldn't want your fancy clothes to catch fire!'
